name: Dino Rancher
description:
Dino Rancher is an idle / clicker game where you dig up DNA remnants to revive dinosaurs! You use them to increase your DNA production in order to find even more creatures! Who knows what this path could mean for the future... 

This is a project under development, the first version is was made in 3 weeks and is coming up soon for PC and later for mobile, with more content and graphical enhancements.

- Gain DNA with every click;

- Revive dinosaurs and recruit their help;

- Upgrade every creature (many times);

- Find all the achievements;

The past and the future are at your hands! What will you do with this power?

You will notice that there are two download options: Dino Rancher Setup.exe and DinoRancher.rar.

Dino Rancher Setup.exe

If you don't want to worry about messing with files, just have fun with the game, Dino Rancher Setup.exe is the option for you! Download the game and follow the installation instructions. In this option it is possible that Windows will try to stop the installation, but don't worry! Just authorize it and the installation will occur normally. 

After that, enjoy your hours of fun with Dino Rancher!

DinoRanhcer.rar

If you don't feel comfortable installing the game on your computer, no problem! The DinoRancher.rar option is what you need. Just download and extract the files, then click on the .exe file with the game symbol!

Now you can enter Dino Rancher!

Enjoy your dinosaurs and have fun clicking around!

The version 0.0.2  (10.27.2022) brings the following improvements:

- New upgrade tier for every creature;

- Dunkleosteus text error patch;
